title: [Large-Scale] Hypermedia-Based Science Schema Acquisition Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Concepts and Fundamental Computer Application Skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in an offline workshop setting using digital devices for novice learners in managerial/leadership roles. Formative assessments are used to continuously monitor learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Learners can derive science problem-solving schemas with 80% accuracy by analyzing worked examples
Learners can identify differences between similar cases at least three times using comparison facilitation tools
Learners can propose solutions to new science problems with at least 70% accuracy by applying acquired schemas
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
